website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, heavy-duty option that is powerful and durable.
pros: Comes with different attachments like a crevice tool and upholstery tool
Comes with a one-year limited warranty
cons: This vacuum requires bags that must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these vacuums due to price and the Bissell name but these vacuums haven't last very long. Planning on using them for at least a year for commercial cleaning. They started perfectly fine. Broken belts were easy to replace and that's normal. But the hose coming unattached constantly due to ill shaped plastic the suction stopping without being clogged, and it whistling non stop due to a gasket missing is not normal in less than a month. I suggest you save your money and buy something that'll last at least six months if you need a commercial cleaning vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love going back to a vacuum that takes bags
customer_reviews.text: Love going back to a vacuum that takes bags. I've had 4 bagless vacuums and they all ended up trashed. The filters get filthy and even cleaning them became such a chore. This is great because once the bag is full it gets pulled off and thrown away with NO SPILL OR MESS! Vacuum is good for our two cats and husky dog. I've been satisfied for our small home and the traffic we see with kids and pets.
customer_reviews.author: JPREVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: BISSELL BigGreen (so far so good)
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is relatively quiet, I love the electrical cord feature, easy to replace if the cord is damaged. The suction is super good, it picks up very well even on my tile area's. The vacuum housing, aka all the plastic parts, wheels, foot lever, dials etc. do not feel like they will last long. I am giving this a 3 rating for now due to all the lower quality plastic. I will comment on status after we have used it for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Grace_AZ

customer_reviews.title: A very nice BAGGED vacuum - IMO the only way to go ...
customer_reviews.text: A very nice BAGGED vacuum - IMO the only way to go - plz BRING BACK BAGGED vacuums!! - Those bagless vacuums look a filthy mess after a month unless you want to spend the time & energy to tear them apart and scrub all that out. As a construction cleaner of 22 years, the basic structure of the 'bagless' design, with all the GAPS, only throws dust back into the air.
customer_reviews.author: JLprt

customer_reviews.title: Broken foot release
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months old. Button to release handle broken. Not sure it can be fixed
customer_reviews.author: J. Duggins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vaccuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning power,great floor adjustments levels,and quiet. It's a 3 prong outlet chord glad my home is equipped with 3 prong outlets. Nice length of power cord also.Fits style 7 vaccuum bags and belts.It don't have no lights at bottom of vaccuum like my last bissell vaccuum did but not concerned about it because i can turn on whatever room light im cleaning so its not a concern just letting others know who reads review, this vaccuum is well worth the price.Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the old residential Bissell Powerforce
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a replacement of the old Bissell Powerforce residential vacuum, this is exactly like it, but green with a long cord. I have used a Bissell upright for years, and was sorry they stopped making that version it and went to a horrible new, even cheaper, design...don't waste your money on that one! My only complaint is the cord is so long, it's a lot of winding up...but you can go much further before you have to change plugs!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Bible

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the  money--Not industrial or commercial grade as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this vacuum is the power plug. It's a commercial-type cord on a lightweight, light-duty type vacuum. The suction was very poor...you couldn't even see the roller marks on the carpet. I made sure the height adjustment was correct. I have hard-wood and tile flooring with thinner type accent rugs throughout my house and the suction was equally poor on all surfaces. Although it was easy to assemble and has a nice power cord, it's not worth the price and/or hassle to have to return, which I did do. No way is this an industrial or commercial grade vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Racquel M.

customer_reviews.title: Light, sucky, easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our cleaning business and our crew seems to really like them. They have decent suction, will lay flat to go under furniture and replacement bags and parts are easy to find. They are very plasticky but that’s how you get the weight savings I guess. We will see if they hold up like my old Eureka commercial vacs.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this vacuum.The bag that came with it broke the second time I used it.The suction is POOR.I thought being a industrail vacuum,I expected much better quilaty.Not like my spelling!I guess I will drop it off at Goodwill,and buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great commerical vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We use this vacuum at Affordable Suites of America group and the housekeepers love it. The hose attachment makes it very useful in getting to small or hard to get to places. It is an excellent product and we will continue to purchase them for our properties. Previously we used the Oreck comparable model, but it did not have the hose attachment. This is the "Cat's Meow"!
customer_reviews.author: William W. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver around, clunky
customer_reviews.text: I find this vacuum clunky and not easy to use. The first one we received sparked and we had to get a replacement. I was suggested from Amazon- additional bags but the bags don't fit.
customer_reviews.author: ThePaperCrown

customer_reviews.title: Suction is bad.
customer_reviews.text: I have my own cleaning business. I've used the Bissell vacuums for years. I have wanted to try the commercial version of the Bissell vacuum. It is double the cost of the regular bagged Bissell. I was very very disappointed after trying the vacuum out because it has very little suction. The other cheaper versions work better. The only advantage of this vacuum is the longer cord. I will be contacting the company to see if I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Goff

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: Crevice device was missing. Had to contact Bissell to get it sent out. They were very friendly. Haven't tried the vacuum to review the suction but will follow up with my review once I do. Putting it together was a breeze. Not sure why they give you a short chord and then an additional chord to attach to that but we will see how this fairs over time. Bought it for our office.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vac for about a month now, primarily to pick up after dog hair. It works well (I'm using the CF Clean Fairy fabric HEPA bags) and it can be quickly upgraded to use a HEPA exhaust filter (just buy them and plop them in, this takes Style 7 & 9 Post-Motor Filter). For the current price (under $150) it's a good vacuum that is fairly quiet, has hose attachments and is adjustable for carpet height.
customer_reviews.author: JC859

customer_reviews.title: Ok vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Hoover vacuums, but I was getting tired of them not lasting and being cheaply made. So I decided to try this one. IT does not have the suction power of my last vacuum, which I greatly miss, it is light weight. I love the long and quality of the plug. It is built pretty good. The hose is rubber and not cheap plastic which is a plus. The handle to hold as you clean your stairs is terrible. I vacuum everyday, I just wish I could find a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not commercial grade as it is described!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these so far. I have a cleaning service and I love the vac for the price. I use it in a couple little dr offices. So far 2 out of 3 of them the wheels broke off. One of them I've only had for a couple months the other it's only been about 6 months. Once they break off the vacuum becomes harder to push as it's closer to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Same as older model but with better cord
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bissell Powerforce that I bought a couple years ago for probably $50 that just wasn't cutting it anymore. All I wanted to do was get a replacement, but Bissell apparently discontinued them. This model is practically identical. Certainly not "industrial" in any way. Same cheap plastic, same everything - except a much better cord. At more than twice the price I expected more, but I'll keep it because there just don't seem to be reliable, cheap, bagged vacuums out there any longer. I've tried and hate the bagless - too many filters that are critical for decent operation. It works OK for my plush wall-to-wall carpet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peden

customer_reviews.title: Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: BISSELL Big Green Commercial Power Force Bagged. This has replaced my Eureka Boss (RIP) loved that machine but was heavy. It is not as powerful as the Boss. But the 10 amps is enough to do the job. Have carpet, laminate flooring, dog and cat. It works really well and saves my back with it's light weight. I also have a Kenmore canister for doing under beds and other chores. But have been grabbing for the Bissell as it is such an ease to use. Was kinda hesitant to buy but glad I did. Hope it gives me years of service like my Boss did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Bissel Big Green Commercial vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say it but this is Bar None the worst vacuum cleaner that I have ever used for cleaning. It does not suck dirt up unless you want to go over it 15 times, use the hose, and go over it again. It is a complete waste of time and money. I would not recommend this vacuum to anybody. I have given it a fair amount of time and this thing is just no good. I can run it, and then run another vacuum cleaner and the other vacuum cleaner will pick up more than this one original did. This is a really bad vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: lightweight=cheap plastic. Very disappointed. We have three dogs, this vacuum clogs with just a few passes. Unclogging entails dissembling and using shop vacuum to remove clog. Extremely difficult to push/pull around carpet-you get quite the workout. Wish I had returned after 1st day using.
customer_reviews.author: Peter E.

customer_reviews.title: It was great!!!...For two months...
customer_reviews.text: It works really great for two months! Then it made a very loud noise...change the belt...cleaned the filters and changed bag. Still suction is not working...tons of dust coming out like doomsday....and the very loud noise. Called / emailed Bissell ...and just send me an email .." ohh so sorry ..it must be frustrating.." And that's all they said...Nothing follows ...And that's Ohh yes, I just want to put it in the thrash!!! Until now...nobody from the Seller reach out. Not even a half star can cover it! And it's Made In China!!!
customer_reviews.author: MARI VERENDIA DELCASTILLO

customer_reviews.title: This pretty green vacuum cleaner works well.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a "big green" monster machine! lol. It is a little bit heavy when moving it. But it does maneuver pretty well, and the cord is so nice and long.
customer_reviews.author: Kayb2uall

customer_reviews.title: We use it every day ; we clean houses
customer_reviews.text: We use our Bissell every day in our business. It runs on the average of 4 hours solid 4 days a week and it never lets us down! Great on carpets or hard woods, pet hair or just good ole dirt, this machine is once and done. Very light weight so its easy getting in and out of our car. Wal Mart carries the bags!
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed So Far
customer_reviews.text: Just got rid of a 10-year-old basic Dirt Devil and replaced it with the Bissell. The Bissell is quieter, lighter, and picks up better. Time will only tell on high long it lasts but it does seem to be quite durable in terms of touch. Tentatively recommended as a smart purchase. Price was very reasonable, too. 5-24-2020 addition: It's still going strong! I'm really impressed with it and so is the wife; the cat hates it, but her vote doesn't count.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Oliver

customer_reviews.title: not a self propel
customer_reviews.text: yes, you do have to push this and give your arm a good workout. It gets down deep into the carpet and with 4 animals, this is a HUGE plus!! 3 cats, 1 dog.... I've used it on the couch and it works SO much better than the Hoover we had. The attachments were great on the cat tower that had not been cleaned in a LONG time... we're talking years. By the time we were done, it looked almost new... almost, because the cats have destroyed some of the carpeting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Parsneau

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it:(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 80 year old mother. While it is light weight, the height levels need to be co scantly adjusted. This is a difficult task for an elderly woman! If it positioned to “low” in the appropriate area, but. It changed for the next room, it is impossible to be pushed - even by me(40 something). I was lured by the fact that it had a bag and was light weight. If this purchase is for an older person, I’d take a pass. Also, I think the suction is very weak - kept passing over the same little fluff and it wouldn’t catch it.
customer_reviews.author: Dishy Q

customer_reviews.title: Worth Your Investment and Time
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the commercial cleaning business for 18 years. We are semi-retired and are just cleaning two medical clinics nightly. The Iowa winters are hard on those floors. This product is worth every penny you invest in it! A lot of bang for the buck! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bagged vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum, easy to use, long cord so you can move around the room and not have to change the plug, has a bag which I love .... when it’s full just throw it away....great suction on carpets, stairs and furniture....I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D

customer_reviews.title: A Bag Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this has a bag, Over years been using non-bag sweeper. With all filters in place seem make dust. Since I been using my new Bissell Bag sweeper I see less dust, plus no filters to clean or replace. How I know after I'm done using sweeper old one had to wipe it down. My bag sweeper I don't see dust on it. Only thing I don't like about this sweeper doesn't clean close to walls. Could had one that did that but at higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Excellent Power, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a great job on carpets. It has excellent suction. Cord is long enough so that you don't have to unplug and move it much. Weight is a little more than I like going up stairs and it could use a better handle to grab from the front. But all in all it is an excellent vacuum cleaner and very sturdy and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. G

customer_reviews.title: Bagged vacuum best for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Powerful vacuum that’s light enough to be conveniently stored and used frequently. Disposable bags and replaceable filter prevent the vacuum from becoming a source of odor when using it. In a house with multiple dogs, this kind of vacuum is the only way to go. This model works well and has a super long cord. Great choice at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig G Laurer

customer_reviews.title: Old one working over 10 years now, time for a new one, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far and I'm very happy with the long, long cord! I can complete the entire house without unplugging it at all, now that is a very nice feature. I've only had it a short time but it picks up great, powerful it is and not to loud or heavy either. I hope this one last 10 years like my old Bissell, which is till working....it's beat up but works and has a new home in our basement now, but 10 years is a long time for a Bissell to last, which is why I came back for a new one!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: BAD Product Review
customer_reviews.text: THis product is awful. The suction for lack of a better word "SUCKS" on hard flooring...ok on rugs. It is heavier than advertised...regret this purchase 100% but assume we can't return for free so don't want to pay for it...didn't even want to give one star rating but there was no option for ZERO...shame on Bissell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a real vacuum after having a Dyson. She hated using the bagless system, fills up fast and disgusting to empty in addition to weak suction. The Bissell has a disposable bag (VEVA 30 pack for $25). Good suction, easy to maneuver. For the guys, it is the same colors as a John Deere Tractor.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey balfus

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love the vacuum, We have a cleaning business, the extra long cord comes in handy. It's lightweight and easy to use. I am going to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: amy campbell

customer_reviews.title: simple
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my mother, I wanted simple but effective, that is exactly what I got. Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Better than other over priced vacuums
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for hotel use and I was worried they would not hold up well, but I was surprised they have been working great and my team loves them. Suction power is still strong, it picks up very well and they are light weight. I normally buy $450+ vacuums and I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these Vacuums for my cleaning business. One only lasted 35 days. The other is starting to make a grinding sound when I'm vacuuming. I wouldn't recommend these Vacuums at all and the Bissell commercial support team is pretty much nonexistent. I couldn't get anyone to help me with returns. Lousy vacuum and no loyalty to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Safobro

customer_reviews.title: Warranty only 90 days
customer_reviews.text: Well, the warranty is lame compared to other vacuum companies. The wand is a friction fit into the vac and is difficult to pull out and return to the vac. And with the wand out and only moderate reach before the vac tips over. The door over the filter bag appears to be a poor design looks like at some point it will not stay in place. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this vacuum for a few weeks, but it seems to do the job. It arrived quickly and was easy to put together. It is lightweight, which is great because as you get older, it is hard to push around a heavy vacuum. Our carpets look good after using it and we are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: avid mystery reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small restaurant. Just put it together and so far so good. Suction seems good. Easy to put together. Although I forgot to buy bags one was included. I’m hoping to be very happy with this vacuum. I’m also thinking of buying one of these for my house possibly.
customer_reviews.author: legomansmom

customer_reviews.title: Super Vac
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd vacuum I purchased and the only one that I absolutely love! It works perfectly and the power cord is the longest I’ve seen, can vac the whole first floor without having to move the plug. The color is a bit bright but that’s the only bad thing about it!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S.

customer_reviews.title: Specified as 12lb but feels heavy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't weighed it but it feels heavy. Also have to buy a HEPA filter to replace the the filter that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied person, depends

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Commercial Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I clean roughly 1,000,000+ sqft of commercial office and common area and have religiously used Windsor Versamatic vacuums forever until I ordered a batch of these and if you maintain them properly I think they work just as good. I suggest buying the hepa cloth bags for the machine and you'll get much longer bag life and they have more suction power.
customer_reviews.author: William89

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this vacuum. I had the cheaper model until my dog chewed through the cord. Replaced it with a bagless vacuum which just created a big mess, hate that style! This vacuum is a bit heavier, works well. Very long cord (which could be replaced with an extension cord in case the dog gets it again!) and longer hose to reach in more places.
customer_reviews.author: a hilton

customer_reviews.title: picks up well
customer_reviews.text: vacuum is great for open areas,but does not work well getting under furniture or tight areas. Does not have an automatic leveler so you have to stop and change levels from carpet to hard floors manually. The cord only comes out of the vacuum about 5 inches then you have to attach the long power cord to it. It does pick up well and no hair gets wrapped around the beater bar. I give it a overall 3
customer_reviews.author: BRYON K

customer_reviews.title: Brush bar
customer_reviews.text: If your using the hose and the vacuum is upright the bar brush keeps moving around and has chewed up rugs and other things. Don't like that the brush keeps moving even when your not vacuuming, very dissapointed. Wish I could return it and get one that doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for my professional cleaning business
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for my professional cleaning business. Extra long and heavy duty cord. Easy to use edger with tools. Light enough for carrying up and down stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and great suction power
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Bissell vacuums and this is no exception. So happy with the light weight and suction power. No problems at all. My husband and I are both in our 50s and this is simple to use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dwill333

customer_reviews.title: Basic vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Pluses: BAGGED, so no-mess emptying of dirt! Simple to operate, with no extraneous bells and whistles. Suction. Minuses: Loud. Not very maneuverable so it requires more muscle power than my bag-less Shark.
customer_reviews.author: LFS

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a feature to make it easier to move the vacuum around. I am a senior citizen with limited strength & found it hard to push & pull. However, I truly like the machine and its cleaning ability.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet Nana

customer_reviews.title: Big and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I have ever owned. It is indeed BIG and sucks up everything (gotta watch out for the dog's tail). It is not the most maneuverable device, but for my purposes it does just fine. It is also not quiet - but it is doing a good job vacuuming so this is also fine.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for a great prive
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old bissell powerforce vacuum with the BigGreen Comercial. I love this vacuum, it is lightweight, has good suction power. Easy to maneuver and the tools are handy to use. I like that it is a bagged vacuum, the filters in the bagless are hard to clean and make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J Casey

customer_reviews.title: Works well but is sure is LOUD!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum as it works well but it is so loud!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I can’t tell you how much I disliked this vacuum!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After having and using this vacuum a few months, I kept hoping it would improve. The suction on this machine is nonexistent. I continued to check to see why it wouldn’t pick up the smallest things. I wish I could return it. I went last week to buy another vacuum because this one simply did not pick up dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Vacuums are not made like they were years ago. This vacuum is good for hardwood floors, the carpets need a go over several times. While it is lightweight, the plastic exterior makes it feel cheap, like a children’s toy. I do not recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a vacuum with bags and this fit the bill. It was a little hard to push against the nap in an older area rug but was doable, that is why only 4 stars on maneuverability (could be the operator LOL). Suction power is great on laminate and vinyl floors. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Martinez

customer_reviews.title: love this Bissel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum. It has so much power and the long cord is awesome. It picks up everything. I have just found my forever vacuum...............
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: vacuums
customer_reviews.text: I have a cleaning company and these vacuums are worth every penny very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really sucks! (In a good way:)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum. It comes with an extra heavy duty extension cord. Nice color and makes cleaning your carpets easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: a great sweeper
customer_reviews.text: I don't care much for bagless vacuums. This is a great sweeper. Lightweight. Easy to change bags. Does a great job. We use it everyday in our church building. It is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Laretta Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Although basic in design and as pointed out similar to the brand’s inexpensive model... However this Commercial model has an increased motor, for powerful suction.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger13

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My staff love these. And for the price I love these. Haven’t had any issues other than replacing belts which is easy and an inevitable issue.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Now, I finally enjoy vacuuming the carpet!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Super easy to assemble. Much better than the Hoover Tempo I had that only lasted a little over a year. The Bissell green machine glides across the carpet with good suction and cleaning power. I like the extra long yellow cord. It's easy to see so I'm less likely to run over it. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum cleaner was just as advertised. It works great for the price. It is very well made and the attachments are very sturdy. My only complaint was the fact that it did not come double boxed, the manufacturer box was not that strong. The vacuum was scratched because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Zellmer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum cleaner. Extra long cord. Awesome that myself or staff don't have to keep unplugging when vacuuming. Extension wands are good for doing stairs or ceiling fans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 5 months and everything is working out great with it. The only issue is a slight squeaky wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this off a recommendation from a housecleaning crew at a MAJOR hotel chain. 14 months later...no good. Save your $$.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good suction
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats so my vacuum needs to be able to pick up cat hair and litter. This model does a good job. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: New To Natural

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible vacuum. It only pushes the stuff back doesn't suck anything. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not much suction.
customer_reviews.text: Used on our very low commercial carpet at the office. The suction was terrible when you raise the brushes above the carpet. Lower the brushes down to the carpet and the suction is good but its difficult to push suckung itself to the floor. Hoing with a Hoover instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love extra long cord... great value... use twice a day, every day for over 3 months... doing great
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J

customer_reviews.title: It sucks!
customer_reviews.text: in the BEST of ways!!! It's an awesome vacuum cleaner!!! Works really well!!!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Great vaccum! I have a professional cleaning business works great!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy garrett

customer_reviews.title: used one time
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked box, put it together used for 10 min on a low carpet and it stop sucking returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks it up and spits it out
customer_reviews.text: I like how lightweight this vacuum is and the suction seems to be good BUT it kicks dirt out of the back of the machine and takes me twice as long to clean the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D Veliky

customer_reviews.title: Tractor Vacuum Lookalike
customer_reviews.text: Finally a bag! Looks like a John Deere tractor but works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but didn't last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum worked well at first. But just 3 months later, in a light industrial use environment, (about 200 square feet of carpet to vacuum each night) it has stopped working. Checked for clogs, changed the bags...the suction isn't working well anymore and the machine is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Jes Muse

customer_reviews.title: Missing part.
customer_reviews.text: There is a missing attachment. There was no crevice tool in the box. Other than that I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B. Eggert

customer_reviews.title: great upright
customer_reviews.text: love it great sweeper does what it says it does
customer_reviews.author: woodstock874

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this vacuum. I was tired of dust floating everywhere when I emptied my previous bagless vacuum cleaner. Making the switch to this vacuum has helped with allergies. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tfree1263

customer_reviews.title: Good price, functional practical
customer_reviews.text: To be honest this is a cute little vacuum that’s best suited for a maid service crew or small office cleaning. It would not survive in a commercial or industrial setting like a large school or warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Low quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Dislike no shut off for beater bar and no on/off switch on handle. Built like the cheapest model with a better cord and quieter motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bissell Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well. The extension cord is a bit weird but it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap crappy machine. Hose won’t stay attached. Height adjuster already broken and I’ve only used the vacuum three times. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Guru

customer_reviews.title: didnt receive the mounting screws
customer_reviews.text: Handle mounting screws were not in package. big time disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jatt Pannu

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy maneuvering.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver over carpet, good suction and brush action. Well pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: KyWonder

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for excellent service and quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bissell Big Green vacuum! It is easy to use with all the attachments and it really SUCKS! I mean it has the best suction power!
customer_reviews.author: cindee

customer_reviews.title: Great commercial vaccum
customer_reviews.text: Great vaccum, great suction. Would recommend. This vaccum was built with power, quality and reliability in mind rather than unnecessary features and styles.
customer_reviews.author: rickdaruler999

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ..love it. We use this at the hotel I work for. That’s how I came to know about it. Just had to order me one. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Bissell customer service is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum came with missing parts, and every time I call I get the runaround. I'd like to return it, but I already threw out the box before realizing that the attachments were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Van Buren

customer_reviews.title: Has a mouth like a Hoover.
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks beautifully. Included cord is long enough for most any duty.
customer_reviews.author: jaysonSEVEN

customer_reviews.title: suction- SUCKS!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have my own, small cleaning business. I used this vacuum cleaner for a month and one thing I can say for sure: suction is very, very poor. I miss my old, good, cheap Hoover Tempo. Unfortunately, it is no longer made.
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata Predota

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bagged sweeper
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find a lightweight bagged sweeper with adequate hose length! This one does the trick. You will not be disappointed! And the extra cord length is amazing too! Thank you Bissell!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stimpert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: So very basic. Light weight because absolutely every part is plastic including hinges. Awful for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not real good
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old Hoover upright does better than this unit!
customer_reviews.author: SD Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum did not work. Vacuum was broken and parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum did not work. Vacuum was broken and parts were missing. Tried to return, but was unsuccessful. Ended up putting into garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Big Green
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power! Easy to handle, just a little heavy. Love it compared to the regular Bissell Bagged Vacumn. Extra long cord, too long sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in my cleaning business. I am very happy with it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Judi D. Bennett

product_meta.title: BISSELL BigGreen Commercial PowerForce Bagged Lightweight, Upright, Industrial, Vacuum Cleaner, BGU1451T
product_meta.description: The Pro PowerForce Upright Vacuum is designed with the user in mind. From the powerful suction to the ready-to-use attachments, this bagged upright vacuum cleaner can clean a variety of surfaces that include bare floor, high carpet, and upholstered furniture. With three filtration stages and cyclonic cleaning system of the lightweight vacuum cleaner, you can easily remove dirt from every nook and corner. The extension wand, long power cord, and five surface height settings, help you conveniently clean thoroughly. The lightweight design makes the vacuum easy to move from room to room and transport from level to level.
feature_bullets: Includes a crevice tool, combination dusting brush/upholstery tool & Extension wand; Attachments store in back of vacuum

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
